BugInstance.message: Constructor new org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.mysql.visitor.format.impl.MySQLFormatSQLVisitor(Properties) makes call to non-final method

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.mysql.visitor.format.impl.MySQLFormatSQLVisitor.visitCombineClause(MySQLStatementParser$CombineClauseContext) passes constant String of length 1 to character overridden method

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.mysql.visitor.format.impl.MySQLFormatSQLVisitor.visitCteClause(MySQLStatementParser$CteClauseContext) passes constant String of length 1 to character overridden method

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.mysql.visitor.format.impl.MySQLFormatSQLVisitor.visitSelect(MySQLStatementParser$SelectContext) passes constant String of length 1 to character overridden method

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.mysql.visitor.statement.impl.MySQLDCLStatementSQLVisitor.generateGrantLevel(MySQLStatementParser$GrantIdentifierContext) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.mysql.visitor.statement.impl.MySQLDDLStatementSQLVisitor.visitAlterList(MySQLStatementParser$AlterListContext) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic
